europeana:record.dc:title: A collection of Thalassinidea, Anomura and Brachyura (Crustacea: Decapoda) from the Kimberley region of Northwestern Australia
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Morgan G.J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Thalassinidea
Anomura
Brachyura
Crustacea
Kimberleys
Australia.
europeana:record.dc:description: One hundred and five species of thalassinidean, anomuran and brachyuran decapod crustaceans are recorded from a 1988 collecting expedition to the Kimberley region of northwestern Australia. An additional 70 species are recorded from the literature. One new species of pagurid hermit crab and a new species of xanthid crab are described.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A collection of Thalassinidea, Anomura and Brachyura (Crustacea: Decapoda) from the Kimberley region of Northwestern Australia (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 265) (Issue 1)
